title: Former WH Press Secretary, Sean Spicer & SOTU Preview
itunes:title: Former WH Press Secretary, Sean Spicer & SOTU Preview
description:
Kevin discusses what to expect from President Trump's State of the Union Address with guests Tom Perez, Chairman of the National Democratic Committee, Sean Spicer, Former WH Press Secretary and Senior Advisor and Spokesman for America First Action, Juliegrace Brufke, Capitol Hill reporter @ The Hill, and Jeffrey Wright, Analyst @ Eurasia Group.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin discusses what to expect from President Trump's State of the Union Address with guests Tom Perez, Chairman of the National Democratic Committee, Sean Spicer, Former WH Press Secretary and Senior Advisor and Spokesman for America First Action, Juliegrace Brufke, Capitol Hill reporter @ The Hill, and Jeffrey Wright, Analyst @ Eurasia Group.
